Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Room(java.lang.String pDescription, java.lang.String pImage)
      Creates a room with a description and a picture.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Associates a description (key) to an item (value)

      Returns the description of the room
      Room getExit(java.lang.String vDirection)
      Returns the exits
      java.lang.String getExitString()
      Returns the exits which are in the HashMap's keys
      java.lang.String getImageName()
      Returns a string describing the image's name of the room
      Item getItem(java.lang.String pDesc)
      Returns the value associated with the key
      java.lang.String getItemDescription()
      Displays items in the current room.
      java.lang.String getLongDescription()
      Returns the description of the room, its exits and its items, if there are items
      boolean itemList(java.lang.String pDesc)
      Returns true if the HashMap contains a key corresponding to the parameters.
      void removeItem(java.lang.String pDesc)
      Removes an item from his description (key)

      Sets the exits of the room and the next room associated

        Sets the exits of the room and the next room associated

        public java.lang.String getLongDescription()

      • itemList

        public boolean itemList(java.lang.String pDesc)
        Returns true if the HashMap contains a key corresponding to the parameters.

      • getItemDescription

        public java.lang.String getItemDescription()
        Displays items in the current room. If there are not items, it displays "There is nothing else."
